custom-meta.meta-value: Data cannot be shared publicly because of confidentiality and requirement by law. The official request of data may be sent to the Division of Planning and Coordination, TCDC for researchers who meet the criteria for access to confidential data. The address is No.6, Linsen S. Rd., Jhongjheng District, Taipei City 10050, Taiwan. The telephone number is 886-2-2395-9825 EXT3070. The email address is r04841010@cdc.gov.tw.
